Olpasiran明显降低了与心血管风险有关的“不良胆固醇”根据Sinai Mount研究人员的分析，RNA抑制剂OLPASIRAN显着降低了与心血管事件的高风险相关的“不良胆固醇”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/Olpasiran-significantly-lowers-bad-cholesterol-linked-to-cardiovascular-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/olpasiran-simnificational-lowers-lowers-bad-cholesterol-ninked to-to-cardiescular-cardiescular-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3064874-a7dd-4f4a-9c7e-6fffd89222225 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:23:31 -0500 Olpasiran significantly lowers "bad cholesterol" linked to cardiovascular risk
研究表明，系统性种族主义可能在基因检测差异中发挥作用。对于具有自闭症，癫痫和全球发育迟缓等神经系统疾病迹象的儿童，基因检测可以帮助做出诊断，确定可能的治疗方法并确定是否可能受到家庭成员的影响以及其他益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/systemitic-racism-may-play-a-play-a-play-a-role-in-genetic-genetic-testing-disparities-nesparities-study-suggests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/systemitic-racism-may-play-a-play-a-play-a-role-in-genetic-ingenetic-testing-desparities-nesparities-sparuity-study-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6089309d-2c78-4313-b76b-fb5b5b6e95237e Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:08:12 -0500 Systemic racism may play a role in genetic testing disparities, study suggests

儿童中耐药的结核病正在上升：需要紧急的全球行动研究人员分析了儿童和青少年中多药耐多药结核病（MDR-TB）的全球趋势，揭示了发病率上升，性别差异以及对低收入地区的不成比例影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/multidrug-resistant-tb-in-children-is-is-rising-urgist-urgent-urgent-chlobal-action-nation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/multidrug-resistant-tb-in-children-is-is-rising-rising-urgist-urgent-rist------ action-action-need.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B2555F2ED-30AE-4394-B344-B344-FF26E2CA9357 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:50:00 -0500 Multidrug-resistant TB in children is rising: Urgent global action needed
